pr_title: TSK-1149: fixed test so that the build will also run on macos

timeline.message: TSK-1149: fixed test so that the build will also run on macos

timeline.bodyText:
Stupid question: Couldn't we just explicitly disable the holidays?
Honestly I don't know if we want to have the Converter running in the background. If there is an error in the converter more tests would not be able to finish successfully
timeline.author: mustaphazorgati

replies.bodyText:
There are other test in the package pro.taskana.monitor.internal which are also enabling the german holidays. As far as i understood these tests test the german holidays explicitly and because the setter for enabling is static it is set for all test which are running afterwards also.
I guess disabling the the german holidays explicitly before this test in SetPlannedAccTest  should also be an solution.
replies.author: sfrevel
